        public CommandContext(CommandInfo commandInfo,
              org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,

              java.lang.String[] rawArgs,
              java.util.List<Tag<?>> args,
              java.util.Map<java.lang.Character,Tag<?>> flags)
        Instances a new CommandContext.
        Parameters:
        commandInfo - The CommandInfo that will be used for the super-call.
        sender - The CommandSyntax that has executed the command.
        command - The Command that has been executed.
        label - The label from the execution.
        rawArgs - The non-parsed arguments of the command.
        args - The parsed arguments.
        flags - The parsed flags.
